info.title: AgentCal API reference
info.description: API documentation for the AgentCal service

apiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
apiKeyAuth.description:
API key required for authentication. 

Keys begin with 'agentcal_' prefix. Get your API key from the [Developer Dashboard](https://dashboard.agentcal.ai/settings/developers). Keys are scoped to an organization.

get.description: This is a test description because I would like to see how it looks in the OpenAPI documentation. This should be a longer description to test how it handles larger text and whether it wraps correctly in the generated docs.
Get all Event Types for a user or organization. If no query parameters are provided, all event types for the organization will be returned.

schema.description: Must be the full unique slug of the event type. Example: 'my-event-type'

get.summary: Get an Event Type by ID

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to access this event type

put.description: Update an event type with full schema support including all scheduling, booking limits, AI assistant settings, and other configuration options

requestBody.description: The event type fields to update. All fields are optional for partial updates.

400.description: Bad request, invalid input data or validation errors

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to update this event type

409.description: Conflict - duplicate slug or other unique constraint violation

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to delete this event type

get.description: Get all Availability Schedules for a user or organization. To get all organization availability schedules, the user's role must be 'admin'. If no query parameters are provided, all availability schedules for the user will be returned.

403.description: Forbidden, user does not have valid permissions

404.description: Not found, organization or user does not exist

get.description: Get a specific availability schedule by its ID. User must own the schedule or be an admin in the organization.

put.description: Update a specific availability schedule by its ID. User must own the schedule or be an admin in the organization.

delete.description: Delete a specific availability schedule by its ID. User must own the schedule or be an admin in the organization.
